VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Demolition
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in taking apart buildings and avoiding setting off traps.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Surveying
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in scanning the terrain for valuable resources.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Gautending
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in supporting dryads from tended Gauranlen trees.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Skulduggery
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in burglarizing other settlements without being caught.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Larceny
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in finding more valuable items when burglarizing other settlements.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Gauscaping
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in supporting dryads from tended Gauranlen trees.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Recycling
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expertise in the recycling of pollution and its byproducts.
